get.description: This endpoint is used to check if underlying scope(s) are healthy.This is an internal API used for monitoring and must not be used by any storefront.The endpoint must not return any sensitive information in the response body like IPs or detailed error messages, but instead write them to internal logs.If all scopes are healthy the implementation should return HTTP Status-Code 200, otherwise it should return HTTP Status-Code 503.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Optional parameter that specifies the scope(s) of the health check. A scope can be a service like Inventory, PIM or Order

post.summary: Creates an empty cart. For convenience it also adds a cart entry when product variant id and quantity are provided.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Three-digit currency code.

parameters.name: productVariantId
parameters.description: The product variant id to be added to the cart entry.

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: The quantity for the product variant.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

Location.description: Location of the newly created cart.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the cart to be returned.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the cart to be removed.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

post.summary: Sets the billing address for the cart.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the cart for the billing address.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The billing address

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

delete.summary: Deletes the billing address for the cart.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the cart for which the billing address will be deleted.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

post.summary: Adds a coupon to the shopping cart.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the cart to which the coupon will be added.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The coupon code.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

delete.summary: Deletes a coupon from the shopping cart.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the cart for which the coupon will be deleted.

parameters.name: couponId
parameters.description: The id of the coupon that will be deleted.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

post.summary: Adds a new cart entry to an existing cart.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the cart for the new entry

parameters.name: productVariantId
parameters.description: The product variant id to be added to the cart entry. If product variant exists in the cart then the cart entry quantity is increased with the provided quantity.

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: The quantity for the new entry.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

Location.description: Location of the newly created cart entry.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the cart.

parameters.name: cartEntryId
parameters.description: The cart entry id to be updated.

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: The cart entry quantity. When quantity is 0 the entry will be removed otherwise the value is used as new quantity.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

delete.summary: Removes a cart entry from the cart.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the cart.

parameters.name: cartEntryId
parameters.description: The cart entry id to be removed.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

post.summary: DEPRECATED. Creates a payment for this shopping cart.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the cart for which the payment will be set.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The payment to create. If the cart belongs to a customer, the customer id must be set.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

delete.summary: DEPRECATED. Removes the payment from the shopping cart.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the cart for which the payment will be deleted.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

get.summary: Retrieves the available payment methods for the current cart.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the cart.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

post.summary: Adds a payment to this shopping cart.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the cart for which the payment will be set.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The payment to create. If the cart belongs to a customer, the customer id must be set.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

delete.summary: Removes the payment with the given ID from the shopping cart.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the cart for which the payment will be deleted.

parameters.name: paymentId
parameters.description: The ID of the payment which will be deleted.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

post.summary: Sets the shipping address for the cart.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the cart for the shipping address.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The shipping address

parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

delete.summary: Deletes the shipping address for the cart.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the cart for which the shipping address will be deleted.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

post.summary: Updates the shipping method for the cart.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the cart for which the shipping method will be updated.

parameters.name: shippingMethodId
parameters.description: The shipping method id.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

delete.summary: Deletes the shipping method for the cart.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the cart for which the shipping method will be deleted.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

get.summary: Retrieves the available shipping methods for the current cart.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the cart.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

get.summary: Returns the entire category structure or a subset of it depending on pagination.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The sort attributes and direction, separated by the pipe character (OpenWhisk does not yet support the 'multi' collection format).

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Defines the number of categories to skip when returning the result.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Defines the maximum number of categories to be returned by that query.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Defines if the request should return either a flat or tree category structure.

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description: Defines the maximum depth of the returned categories. No value means infinite depth, 0 means only the root categories.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The slug of the category to return. The slug needs to uniquely identify the category and can be a path that contains slashes.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the category to return.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

post.summary: Performs an authentication request to obtain a customer access token.
post.description: Currently two types are supported: "guest" returns a token for a new guest (non-authenticated) customer and "credentials" authenticates a registered customer and returns a token upon successful authentication otherwise results in an error.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of authentication request.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address of the customer, required for type = credentials.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password for this customer, required for type = credentials.

post.summary: Performs a customer login, potentially merging an anonymous cart with a customer cart.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address of the customer.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password for this customer.

parameters.name: anonymousCartId
parameters.description: An optional anonymous cart id to be merged during the login process.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

get.summary: Returns customer data based on the authorization header bearer token.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The authorization 'bearer' token of the customer.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the customer.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

post.summary: Processes a GraphQL request and returns a GraphQL response.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The graphQL JSON request

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

get.summary: Queries inventory based on the given query parameters.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The list of product identifiers for which the inventory will be queried.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The list of scopes for which the inventory will be queried.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Defines the number of inventory items to skip when returning the result.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Defines the maximum number of inventory items to be returned in the result.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

post.summary: Creates an order based on a cart.

parameters.name: cartId
parameters.description: The id of the cart from which the order will be created.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

Location.description: Location of the newly created order.

get.summary: Searches products based on the given query parameters.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text to search if this is a full-text search.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The search filters, separated by the pipe character (OpenWhisk does not yet support the 'multi' collection format).

parameters.name: selectedFacets
parameters.description: The facets values used for filtering, separated by the pipe character (OpenWhisk does not yet support the 'multi' collection format).

parameters.name: queryFacets
parameters.description: The facets list to be calculated, separated by the pipe character (OpenWhisk does not yet support the 'multi' collection format).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The sort attributes and direction, separated by the pipe character (OpenWhisk does not yet support the 'multi' collection format).

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Defines the number of products to skip when returning the result.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Defines the maximum number of products to be returned by that search.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The slug of the product to return. The slug needs to uniquely identify the product and can be a path that contains slashes.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the product to return.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

get.description: The entries property is empty for all shopping lists in the response. To retrieve entries, query a single shopping list.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Defines the number of shopping lists to skip.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Defines the maximum number of shopping lists to be returned.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

post.summary: Creates a new shopping list for the current user.
post.description: The name and description properties will be stored as localized strings in the language defined by the Content-Language header.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the shopping list.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of the shopping list.

parameters.name: Content-Language
parameters.description: Language of the shopping list.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

Location.description: Location of the newly created shopping list.

get.summary: Gets a users shopping list with a given id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the shopping list to return.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

put.summary: Replaces a shopping list with the given one.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the shopping list to replace.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the shopping list.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of the shopping list.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the shopping list to be deleted.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

get.summary: Gets all entries from a shopping list.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the shopping list to return entries from.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Defines the number of entries to skip.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Defines the maximum number of entries to be returned.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

post.summary: Creates a new entry for a shopping list.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the shopping list.

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: The quantity for the new entry.

parameters.name: productVariantId
parameters.description: The product variant id to be added to the entry. If the product variant exists in the shopping list, its quantity is increased with the provided quantity.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

Location.description: Location of the newly created entry.

get.summary: Gets a single entry from a shopping list.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the shopping list.

parameters.name: entryId
parameters.description: The id of the shopping list entry to return.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

put.summary: Replaces an entry with the given one.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the shopping list.

parameters.name: entryId
parameters.description: The id of the entry to replace.

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: The quantity for the new entry.

parameters.name: productVariantId
parameters.description: The product variant id to be added to the entry. If the product variant exists in another entry in the shopping list, this request fails.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

delete.summary: Deletes an entry from a shopping list.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the shopping list.

parameters.name: entryId
parameters.description: The id of the entry.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred.

organizationName.description: Organization name. Can be company name.

additionalStreetInfo.description: Additional details for the street address.

id.description: The unique id for this text attribute, for example 'width'.

name.description: The name for this text attribute.

value.description: The value of the attribute. This can be any arbitrary valid JSON value.

isVariantAxis.description: If true, this attribute is a variant attribute. If not set or false, the attribute is a normal/simple attribute.

scope.description: The scope the user granted to if supported by commerce backend.

access_token.description: The access token string as issued by the commerce backend.

token_type.description: The type of token this is, typically just the string "bearer".

expires_in.description: If the access token expires, the backend specifies a number of seconds after which the access token expires, and is no longer valid. Expiration of access tokens is optional.

refresh_token.description: The refresh token is used to obtain a new access token after the original access token is expired. A refresh token will not be returned in case the access token does not expire or the commerce engine does not support it.

createdAt.description: The date-time when this object was created. The JSON representation must be in RFC339 / ISO8601 format

lastModifiedAt.description: The date-time when this object was last modified. The JSON representation must be in RFC339 / ISO8601 format

entries.description: The list of the entries in the cart.

customerId.description: If set, this defines the customer owning this cart. If not set, the cart is an anonymous cart.

netTotalPrice.description: The net total price for the cart, including discounts, and shipping, but excluding any taxes. Until a shipping address is set, this field is typically not set.

grossTotalPrice.description: The gross total price for the cart, including discounts, shipping, and all taxes. Until a shipping address is set, this field is typically not set.

productTotalPrice.description: The product subtotal for the cart, including discounts and with or without taxes depending if the product prices include taxes or not.Until a shipping address is set, this field is typically used as the temporary cart total until it is known if prices include taxes or not.

taxInfo.description: The cart tax info, including cart entries tax and shipping info tax. Until a shipping address is set, this field is typically not set.

taxIncludedInPrices.description: Indicates if taxes are included or not in all the prices. Until a shipping address is set, this field is typically not set.

shippingAddress.description: The shipping address for the cart products.

shippingInfo.description: The shipping info for the cart.

discounts.description: A list of all applied discounts.

billingAddress.description: The billing address for the cart.

payment.description: DEPRECATED. The payment details for the cart.

payments.description: A list of payment details for the cart.

coupons.description: A list of all coupons of the cart.

discounts.description: A list of all applied discounts.

price.description: The calculated cart entry price. May or may not include taxes, depending on the tax policy.

discountedPrice.description: The cart entry price after all discounts have been applied.

taxInfo.description: The cart entry tax info. Until a shipping address is set, this field is typically not set.

createdAt.description: The date-time when this object was created. The JSON representation must be in RFC339 / ISO8601 format

lastModifiedAt.description: The date-time when this object was last modified. The JSON representation must be in RFC339 / ISO8601 format

id.description: The internal unique ID of the category in the commerce backend system.

slug.description: Slug or human readable key that uniquely identifies the category and that can be used for SEO friendly urls. The slug can be a path containing slashes.

mainParentId.description: The id of the main parent category (if this category has multiple parents).

parents.description: The list of parent categories for this category. Depending on the backend system, the returned items may only have their ids being set.

children.description: The list of subcategories for this category. Depending on the backend system, the returned items may only have their ids being set.

id.description: The id of the coupon instance applied to a cart. If not supported by commerce engine, should be equal to code.

code.description: The code to activate the coupon.

createdAt.description: The date-time when this object was created. The JSON representation must be in RFC339 / ISO8601 format

lastModifiedAt.description: The date-time when this object was last modified. The JSON representation must be in RFC339 / ISO8601 format

id.description: The unique id of this customer

description.description: The description associated with the discount. May be displayed in the UI.

multiSelect.description: Indicates if the facet is multi selectable.

values.description: List of facetValues calculated for this facet.

occurrences.description: The number of facet value occurrences.

selected.description: Indicates if the current facet value was selected.

query.description: The query string in graphQL query format.

operationName.description: Only required if multiple operations are present in the query.

variables.description: An optional JSON object defining variables for the query.

data.description: If successful, this contains the JSON data returned by a graphQL request.

errors.description: If any, this contains a JSON array of the errors encountered while executing a graphQL request.

reports.description: The list of status reports for this response.
The list of status reports for this response.

scope.description: The scope for the inventory (i.e store or channel).

availableQuantity.description: The product available quantity for this inventory.

restockDaysPeriod.description: The period in days when this inventory is restocked.

expectedDeliveryDate.description: The next expected delivery date for this inventory.

customer.description: The customer info returned by the login process

cart.description: The current or merged cart created during the login process

currency.description: The currency code for this money value.

amount.description: The amount in cents of this money value.

country.description: The country code for this money value.

offset.description: The offset for this response, this is the number of elements skipped, not a page number.

count.description: The actual number of results returned in results.

total.description: The total number of results matching the query.

facets.description: The list of facets for this response.

offset.description: The offset for this response, this is the number of elements skipped, not a page number.

count.description: The actual number of results returned in results.

total.description: The total number of results matching the query.

facets.description: The list of facets for this response.

count.description: The actual number of results returned in results.

offset.description: The offset for this response, this is the number of elements skipped, not a page number.

count.description: The actual number of results returned in results.

facets.description: The list of facets for this response.

offset.description: The offset for this response, this is the number of elements skipped, not a page number.

count.description: The actual number of results returned in results.

facets.description: The list of facets for this response.

createdAt.description: The date-time when this object was created. The JSON representation must be in RFC339 / ISO8601 format

lastModifiedAt.description: The date-time when this object was last modified. The JSON representation must be in RFC339 / ISO8601 format

customer.description: The customer the payment belongs to. If this is not set the payment belongs to an anonymous customer.

method.description: DEPRECATED. The method for this payment like Card or Cash.

methodId.description: The id of the payment method for this payment.

token.description: The token used to communicate with the payment service provider.

statusCode.description: The external status code for the payment.

status.description: The external status message/text for the payment.

id.description: The id of the payment method.

name.description: The name of the payment method.

description.description: The description of the payment method.

createdAt.description: The date-time when this object was created. The JSON representation must be in RFC339 / ISO8601 format

lastModifiedAt.description: The date-time when this object was last modified. The JSON representation must be in RFC339 / ISO8601 format

id.description: The internal unique ID of the product in the commerce backend system.

slug.description: Slug or human readable key that uniquely identifies the product and that can be used for SEO friendly urls. The slug can be a path containing slashes.

sku.description: The unique SKU of the product assigned by the vendor or manufacturer.

masterVariantId.description: The id of the master variant

createdAt.description: The date-time when this object was created. The JSON representation must be in RFC339 / ISO8601 format

lastModifiedAt.description: The date-time when this object was last modified. The JSON representation must be in RFC339 / ISO8601 format

id.description: The internal unique ID of the product in the commerce backend system.

slug.description: Slug or human readable key that uniquely identifies the product and that can be used for SEO friendly urls. The slug can be a path containing slashes.

sku.description: The unique SKU of the product variant assigned by the vendor or manufacturer.

available.description: Indicates if the product is available or not in the inventory.

id.description: The id of the shipping method.

name.description: The name of the shipping method.

description.description: The description of the shipping method.

createdAt.description: The date-time when this object was created. The JSON representation must be in RFC339 / ISO8601 format

lastModifiedAt.description: The date-time when this object was last modified. The JSON representation must be in RFC339 / ISO8601 format

id.description: The id of the shopping list.

name.description: The name of the shopping list.

description.description: The description of the shopping list.

entries.description: The entries of the shopping list.

customerId.description: The customer id that owns this shopping list.

createdAt.description: The date-time when this object was created. The JSON representation must be in RFC339 / ISO8601 format

lastModifiedAt.description: The date-time when this object was last modified. The JSON representation must be in RFC339 / ISO8601 format

productVariant.description: The product variant for the entry.

healthy.description: Indicates if scope is healthy or not.

message.description: Optional message to accompany the reported healthy status. Typically useful when scope is not healthy.

value.description: The value of the tax info, which is the total value of the tax portions.

name.description: The name for this tax portion.

value.description: The value of the tax portion.
